app.infomodal.title: How to play
app.infomodal.info: Guess the code in 6 tries. After each guess, the color of the tiles will change to show how close your guess was to the code. The code can have repeated numbers.
app.infomodal.correct: The number 2 is in the code and in the correct spot.
app.infomodal.present: The number 5 is in the code but in the wrong spot.
app.infomodal.absent: The number 7 is not in the code in any spot.
app.infomodal.neweveryday: A new code will be available each day!
app.infomodal.sequencesinfo: Some hints are based on well-known integer sequences
app.hintsmodal.title: Hints
app.hintsmodal.info: These are the hints to crack the code:
app.settingsmodal.title: Settings
app.supportersmodal.title: Supporters
app.supportersmodal.info: Thank you all that have bought me a coffee!
